Uses of Class
dungeon.inventory.spell.Spell

  • Packages that use Spell 
    Package Description
    dungeon.entity
    Represents all entities you can see in the game, like players and other monsters.
    dungeon.entity.monster
    Represents all monsters entities you can see in the game.
    dungeon.entity.types
    Represents all Entity types.
    dungeon.inventory.spell
    Here you can find all Spells you can be attack with or just you can use in an enumeration.
